an6.31:4.1: “These six things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an6.31:4.3: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much.
an6.31:4.4: These six things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
an6.31:5.1: These six things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an6.31:5.3: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They guard the sense doors, and they don’t eat too much.
an6.31:5.4: These six things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
